autofocus.desc: Focus first focusable element on initial component render

no-error-focus.desc: Do not try to focus on first component that has a validation error when submitting form

no-reset-focus.desc: Do not try to focus on first component when resetting form

greedy.desc: Validate all fields in form (by default it stops after finding the first invalid field with synchronous validation)

submit.desc: Emitted when all validations have passed when tethered to a submit button

reset.desc: Emitted when all validations have been reset when tethered to a reset button; It is recommended to manually reset the wrapped components models in this handler

validation-success.desc: Emitted after a validation was triggered and all inner Quasar components models are valid

validation-error.desc: Emitted after a validation was triggered and at least one of the inner Quasar components models are NOT valid

ref.desc: Vue reference to the first component that triggered the validation error

focus.desc: Focus on first focusable element/component in the form

validate.desc: Triggers a validation on all applicable inner Quasar components

shouldFocus.desc: Tell if it should focus or not on component with error on submitting form; Overrides 'no-focus-error' prop if specified

returns.desc: Promise is always fulfilled and receives the outcome (true -> validation was a success, false -> invalid models detected)

resetValidation.desc: Resets the validation on all applicable inner Quasar components

submit.desc: Manually trigger form validation and submit

getValidationComponents.desc: Get an array of children Vue component instances that support Quasar validation API (derived from QField, or using useFormChild()/QFormChildMixin)

returns.desc: Quasar validation API-compatible Vue component instances
